Return Data.performance_summary: Analysis of 4 warehouses over January 2024 shows mixed performance. WH001 leads in cost efficiency at 94.2%, while WH018 excels in delivery speed with 96.8% on-time delivery. Capacity utilization averages 78.5% across all locations with room for optimization.
improvement_opportunities: WH005: Cost efficiency 3.3% below benchmark - optimize routing algorithms
WH012: Delivery speed 2.1% below benchmark - review fulfillment processes
WH012: Capacity utilization 10.8% below benchmark - implement dynamic space allocation
WH018: Cost efficiency 5.5% below benchmark - analyze transportation costs
